title: Great Movie but why the shaky camera
review: We saw this in IMAX, which gave a very good impression of what it must have been like on blast-off. What spoilt it was the shaky camera during domestic scenes, did they give it to a child to hold?

title: Totally Unbelievable
review: This is a rather silly story, that has no semblance of credibility. It's a pity, because if the script resembled reality a bit more, it would have been quite good.
